Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the applicant's refusal to disclose information about his work at the Iranian Defense Industries Organization constitute misrepresentation under IRPA?
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review assessed whether procedural fairness was breached and if IRPA was correctly applied
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Withholding material facts that could induce an error in the administration of the Act
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Applicant's repeated refusal to disclose details about his work at DIO during interviews
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Section 40(1)(a) deems a person inadmissible for withholding material facts
Crimes.Application_Factor: Refusal to answer questions about employment with DIO
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether procedural fairness was breached and IRPA correctly applied
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Refusal to disclose work at Iranian Defense Industries Organization
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Fear of reprisal cited as reason for non-disclosure
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose relevant employment history

Crimes.Crime_Name: Withholding material facts relating to a relevant matter under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the applicant's refusal to disclose information about his work at the Iranian Defense Industries Organization constitute misrepresentation under IRPA s. 40(1)(a)?
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of Counsellor Dupuis' decision refusing permanent residency application
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Withholding material facts relating to a relevant matter that could induce an error in the administration of the Act
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Applicant's refusal to answer questions regarding employment with Iranian Defense Industries Organization
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Withholding material facts under s. 40(1)(a) constitutes misrepresentation
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Refusal to disclose employment details with DIO
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Fear for life cited as reason for non-cooperation
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Judicial review of administrative inadmissibility finding
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to provide required information on employment
